included_claims.statement: The renderer targets 120 FPS and strict per-frame execution budgets.

citations.excerpt: Firmware implements clock spine render timing diagnostics with 2-second logging intervals RendererActor.cpp tracks audio frame age, render intervals, and beat clock integration with detailed performance metrics.
RendererActor runs at 120 FPS on ESP32 Core 1 with tight frame budget RendererActor implementation shows 8.33ms frame budget with 2-4ms render time and 2ms LED driver overhead.

Kuramoto Oscillator Research Documentation Created Comprehensive research documents covering mathematics, computational efficiency, audio mapping, and implementation roadmap for coupled oscillator LED effects.

Architected Complete Oscillator Field System Integration Pattern Designed three-layer architecture with PSRAM-backed OscillatorField physics engine, abstract OscillatorFieldEffect base, and concrete effect implementations.

Designed dt-Correct Coupled Oscillator System for LED Effects Architected frame-rate independent Kuramoto oscillator implementation using semi-implicit Euler integration with O(N) local coupling and Gaussian perturbation support.

Design Brief for Stateful Dynamical Audio-Reactive Effects Beyond Beat Pulses Architectural mandate requiring coupled oscillator systems with audio as steering signals not direct rendering to prevent pattern sameness.
